info.title: Website Core Page Builder
info.description: It's a singleton pattern implementation for Website Page Builder. Builds the website page loading the page view from the given path.

const.name: HOLDER
const.description: The main page holder to load the page view.

const.name: REPORT
const.description: The page report holder, in case of errors.

prop.name: pageAttributes
prop.description: Page attributes for building the ui object. Includes title, meta and more.

method.name: getInstance
method.description: Gets the instance of the WSPage.

parameter.name: $pageAttributes
parameter.description: The page attributes. It includes the page title, whether it will have meta information and more.

method.name: build
method.description: Builds the spine of the page.

parameter.name: $pagePath
parameter.description: The page path to load the page view.

method.name: __construct
method.description: Initializes the Website Page with the page attributes.

parameter.name: $pageAttributes
parameter.description: An array of page attributes, including title and meta information.

method.name: addResources
method.description: Adds the initial static resources to the page header (including initial packages for styles and javascript).

parameter.name: $pagePath
parameter.description: The page path to load the page view.

method.name: setHead
method.description: Inserts all the meta tags, scripts and styles to head.
